front.title: BGP Link State extensions for IPv6 Segment Routing(SRv6)

abstract.t: Segment Routing IPv6(SRv6) allows for a flexible definition of end- to-end paths within various topologies by encoding paths as sequences of topological sub-paths, called "segments". These segments are advertised by the various protocols such as (BGP, IGP, BGP-LS etc). BGP Link-state(BGP-LS) address-family solution for SRv6 is consistent with BGP-LS for SR-MPLS [I-D.ietf-idr-bgp-ls-segment-routing-ext]. This draft defines extensions to the BGP-LS to carry SR/SRv6 Segments, Services and function information via BGP.
